title: Changing Your Name on Facebook to Show Maiden & Married Names

steps.title: Tap the menu in the Facebook app ☰.
steps.content: Tap the menu in the Facebook app ☰ . You'll see these three horizontal lines at the top-right corner on Android, and at the bottom-right on iPhone/iPad.

steps.title: Tap your name at the top.
steps.content: Tap your name at the top. This takes you to your profile.

steps.title: Tap See your About info.
steps.content: Tap See your About info . This option is under the "Details" header on your profile, just below your location and signup date.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Add Other Name.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Add Other Name . It's under the "Other names" header. If you already have another name here, you can tap the pencil icon on that name to make any changes you need. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select Maiden Name.
steps.content: Select Maiden Name . Alternatively, if you already use your maiden name and want to add your married name, select Married Name .

steps.title: Enter your maiden name.
steps.content: Enter your maiden name. Or, if you're adding your married name, enter that instead. If you want your maiden name to appear at the top of your profile, check the "Show at the top of profile" box. Even if you don't want to show your maiden name at the top of your profile, people can still see it on your About page, and they'll still be able to find you when searching.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Now, when people search for you by your maiden or married name, they can find you easily.

steps.title: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Facebook.
steps.content: Click your profile photo at the top-right corner of Facebook. This expands a menu.

steps.title: Click your name at the top.
steps.content: Click your name at the top. This takes you to your Facebook profile.

steps.title: Click the About tab.
steps.content: Click the About tab. It's near the top of your profile between "Posts" and "Friends".

steps.title: Click Details about you.
steps.content: Click Details about you . You'll find this under the "About" heading on the left.

steps.title: Click + Add a nickname, a birth name….
steps.content: Click + Add a nickname, a birth name… . This option is under the "Other names" heading. Alternatively, if you want to change your maiden name (or any other names that appear under "Other names," click the three dots to do so now.

steps.title: Select Maiden Name.
steps.content: Select Maiden Name . Alternatively, if you already use your maiden name and want to add your married name, select Married Name .

steps.title: Enter your maiden name.
steps.content: Enter your maiden name. Or, if you're adding your married name, enter that instead. If you want your maiden name to appear at the top of your profile, check the "Show at the top of profile" box. Even if you don't want to show your maiden name at the top of your profile, people can still see it on your About page, and they'll still be able to find you when searching.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Now, when people search for you by your maiden or married name, they'll be able to find you easily.
